Articles.Content:
I have an idea/request.  We need a "blow the hatch" mod that lets you explode anything you accidentally attached to your hatch that is stopping you from opening it.

No idea how you would do this, but it would sure would have been handy on my last Mun landing.

41 minutes ago, Probus said:

I have an idea/request.  We need a "blow the hatch" mod that lets you explode anything you accidentally attached to your hatch that is stopping you from opening it.

No idea how you would do this, but it would sure would have been handy on my last Mun landing.

 

ahaha, i'm not a modder but this kind of mod would come in handy for sticky situations. it's not like you can't survive landings without parachutes right??

4 hours ago, Probus said:

I have an idea/request.  We need a "blow the hatch" mod that lets you explode anything you accidentally attached to your hatch that is stopping you from opening it.

No idea how you would do this, but it would sure would have been handy on my last Mun landing.

 

Kaboom let you do this exactly, more or less.
